channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- PeopleSoft Enterprise CC Common Application Objects
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- PeopleSoft Enterprise CC Common Application Objects

item.title: CVE-2023-22090|2024-09-13T16:07:52.931Z -- oracle%20corporation -- peoplesoft%20enterprise%20cc%20common%20application%20objects
item.description: Vulnerability in the PeopleSoft Enterprise CC Common Application Objects product of Oracle PeopleSoft (component: Events & Notifications). The supported version that is affected is 9.2. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise PeopleSoft Enterprise CC Common Application Objects. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all PeopleSoft Enterprise CC Common Application Objects accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 6.5 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).
